column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH: Forces of the Anti-Drug Departments on the 15th ------October 2018 prevented the illegal transportion of illicit drugs from Cambodia to Australia at the offices of parcel company Expressway on Russian Federation
column7: detained 2 people. ------The suspects include: 1 / Chan Dara
column10: 55 were caught at the company offices attempting to post a parcel.------ ------961.90 grams of Methamphetamine (ICE) were found hidden in a cuddly toy inside the box.------DAP
